version_description:
Fly & Explore: Discover exciting worlds and collect hundreds of amazing items.
Toys & Booboos: Play with toys and care for Talking Tom if he gets a booboo.
Pets & Mini games: Five pets now live with Tom and star in cool new mini games.
Pick Tom up: Spin him, drop him, throw him, and put him where you want him.

Fly & Explore: Discover exciting worlds and collect hundreds of amazing items.
Toys & Booboos: Play with toys and care for Talking Tom if he gets a booboo.
Pets & Mini games: Five pets now live with Tom and star in cool new mini games.
Pick Tom up: Spin him, drop him, throw him, and put him where you want him.

NEW MINI GAME: Dodge the ghosts in Tom’s spookiest mini game ever!
WINTER WONDERLANDS: Exciting holiday gifts will be available just before the holidays!
COLORING BOOK: Add color to drawings then decorate Tom’s room with them!

NEW MINI GAME: Dodge the ghosts in Tom’s spookiest mini game ever!
WINTER WONDERLANDS: Exciting holiday gifts will be available just before the holidays!
COLORING BOOK: Add color to drawings then decorate Tom’s room with them!

CHINESE CELEBRATION: Fly to the special destination to get exciting new gifts.
NEW MINI GAME: Dodge the ghosts in Tom’s spookiest mini-game ever!
COLORING BOOK: Add color to drawings then decorate Tom’s room with them!

MAKE MAGIC! Learn amazing tricks!
Watch out for snowfall and frost!
Fly and collect holiday gifts!

NEW FUNNY VOICES! Try Tom’s talking puppets!
Fly to win carnival prizes!
Win bonus rewards on the Flight Challenge!

NEW: PET WISHES! Make pets happy - win rewards!
Get artistic with new paintings!

NEW: TOYS FOR PETS! Get the party started in the pet den!
GET ARTISTIC: Try out two new paintings!

NEW MINI-GAME: Dive into Sub Adventure!
WHO’S THE BEST DRESSED? Let others rate your looks!

TRY THE NEW TOY: Play the drums as loud as you can!
SMOOTHIE MAKER: Make smoothies and see how Tom likes them.
PETS REACT: Poke Tom’s pets and watch their reactions.

NEW MINI-GAME: Dive into Sub Adventure!
WHO’S THE BEST DRESSED? Let others rate your looks!

NEW: TOYS FOR PETS! Get the party started in the pet den!
GET ARTISTIC: Try out two new paintings!

NEW: PET WISHES! Make pets happy - win rewards!
Get artistic with new paintings!

PLAY NEW CHALLENGES! - Look out for special ways to win rewards!
SPLAT! Get messy with the mixer!

NEW FUNNY VOICES! Try Tom’s talking puppets!
Fly to win carnival prizes!
Win bonus rewards on the Flight Challenge!

MAKE MAGIC! Learn amazing tricks!
Watch out for snowfall and frost!
Fly and collect holiday gifts!
Spring is here! Look out for falling blossom in Tom's garden.
Spring is here! Look out for falling blossom in Tom's garden.

GRANT A WISH!
Fulfill pets’ wishes to get flight tokens!
Look out for a pirate adventure!
Is it a trick? Or is it magic?

GRANT A WISH! Fulfill pets’ wishes to get flight tokens!
Look out for a pirate adventure!
Is it a trick? Or is it magic?

EXPLORE THE SEA
Dive into the underwater world!
Watch out for deep diving adventures!

TASTE THE CANDY!
Catch the candy event and get sweet rewards!
Win with magic tricks!

FUN AT THE FAIR
Find the event and win wacky rewards!
Is it a trick? Or is it magic?

THE HOLIDAYS ARE HERE!
There’s been a sprinkling of snow and Tom is ready for the holidays. Meet the snowman and enjoy festive food and outfits.

CHINESE FESTIVITIES
Fly to get new gifts!

WINTER WONDERLAND
A fresh blanket of snow has fallen in time for the Dragon Festival. Enjoy the celebrations!

SPRING SPECIAL
Spring has arrived and this year it’s coated in sugar! Find the piñata and other sweet treats waiting for Tom.

MAKE A SPLASH
Summer’s here so it’s time to stay cool and go underwater. Keep an eye out for treasure on the coral reef!
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

THE FUTURE AWAITS
Time to go back to space. Wait, what? Forget school and fly to a far-out Cyber City in this update!
